title: The Future Right Now
itunes:title: The Future Right Now
description:
In this episode sponsored by Nissan, we take a look at the technologies being developed right now that will reshape the web and how we interact online. From Web3 to the metaverse to, yes, NFTs, we look at what's good, what's bad and what could define our future.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
In this episode sponsored by Nissan, we take a look at the technologies being developed right now that will reshape the web and how we interact online. From Web3 to the metaverse to, yes, NFTs, we look at what's good, what's bad and what could define our future.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: NFT, non-fungible token, Web3, Web 3.0, Meta, Facebook, Google, Amazon, decentralized, blockchain, cryptocurrency, metaverse, virtual reality, vr, augmented reality, ar, mixed reality, xr, Roblox, Minecraft, Fortnite, Second Life
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
